message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. I think it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $95 for your product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down to $105. This is still a fair price for both of us, as it's closer to my minimum value.  Let's make this happen!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $100 for your product.
